'''Tedder Hedgerow''' is a [[Bree-hobbits|Hobbit]] from [[Bree]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]''. He is a adept player of the [[Riddle-game]], being the best of Bree. He can be found in the [[Prancing Pony]], and challenges the player with a riddle, in reward of money.<ref>''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'', ''Prologue''</ref>
